data.title: LEHMAN COLLEGE ART GALLERY
data.text:
Other war memorials throughout the Bronx include:

Raymond Barger

dedicated in 1940

granite and bronze

7' x 51" x 20.5"

Metropolitan Avenue and

Unionport Road

Parks and Recreation

14' 10" x 7'

Mosholu Parkway

installed 1936

granite, steel and base

Crames Square

Parks and Recreation

John Grignola

ca. 1909

granite, 5' 9" x 3' x 2'

Valentine-Varian House Park

3266 Bainbridge Avenue

City of New York

Max Hansle
